original_text: Now I want you to know, brothers and sisters, that what has happened to me has actually served to advance the gospel.
korean_text: 형제들아 내가 당한 일이 도리어 복음 전파에 진전이 된 줄을 너희가 알기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: Now I want you to know, brothers and sisters
sentences.korean_translation: 자매들이여, 내가 너희에게 알게 하고자 한다

sentences.original_text: that what has happened to me
has actually served to advance the gospel
